english: You remind me of who I am.
You've led us all to disaster.
You're a coward who betrayed his mother.
Maybe this will remind you, brother.
Two brothers drag Kayi to the cliff

text: Bakalım bu işin sonu nereye varacak

english: The goods we bought from the apricots from here to Iconia

text: ardından da İznik'e göndermek için bana
english: And then send it to me to Iznik.

text: en az kırk tane deve lazım

english: Mr. Gündüz is on his way.

text: Beni obaya götürdüğünde mahcup olmak istemem
english: I don't want to be embarrassed when you take me to the room.

text: Sen yokken ortalık çok karıştı ağabey
english: There's been a lot of trouble while you were gone, brother.

text: hem de obayı kurtarmanın tek bir yolu var
english: And there's only one way to save the oba.
I came here to talk to you about it.

text: Noyan bize bir kurtuluş imkanı verdi
english: Noyan gave us a chance to escape.
Calm down. Just listen to me.

text: Sizler gerçek kahramanlarsınız Buraya gelerek bunu gösterdiniz
english: You're real heroes. You showed it by coming here.

text: Kargın anlatmıştır. Ögeday Konya ile yetinmeyecek
english: He'll tell you about the conflict. He won't be satisfied with the host.

text: Sonra da Avrupa'nın içlerine kadar ilerleyecek
english: And then it'll go all the way back to Europe.

text: Şimdi bu zenginlikten nasibini alacak savaşçılar mı olmak istersiniz
english: Now you want to be warriors who will inherit this wealth?

text: yoksa cihanın gördüğü en büyük orduya kafa tutmaya kalkan zavallılar mı?
english: Or are they the poor ones who defy the greatest army the jihad has ever seen?

text: Tüccar ve iş yaptığı bütün adamlar öldü
english: The merchant and all the men he did business with died.

text: Gündoğdu, hayvanlarını ve kilimhanedeki değerli mallarını satamayacak
english: The sun will rise, he won't be able to sell his animals and his valuables in the rug.

text: Obada kardeşleri Dodurgalılar bakalım ne yapacak
english: Let's see what the Obada brothers Dodurga do.

text: Uzun ve soğuk kış günlerinde bakalım ekmeklerini ne kadar bölüşecekler
english: In the long, cold winter days, let's see how much they'll split their bread.

text: Ben de varım Ben de varım
Süleyman Şah'ıma, onun şerefli obasına ve töremize ihanet edemem
english: I will not betray my king, his honorable obama and our customs.

text: Cihanın gördüğü en büyük ordu bizi bekler Alpler
english: The greatest army the jihad has ever seen awaits us, the Alps.
It's from the recordings. It's from the apricots.

text: Bana Gündoğdu Bey’i bulun Diyeceklerim var
english: Find me Mr. Gündüz I have something to say

text: Tuğtekin doğru söylemiş Hamza hain çıktı
english: He's right. Hamza is a traitor.
Hamza has joined forces with Karşýk...

text: …on bir Kayı Alpini de yanına alıp Noyan’ın safına geçmiş
english: ...and took 11 of the Alpine Kais with him to join Noyan's side.

text: Kocabaş, atları hazırla Hainlerin peşinden gideceğiz
english: Bighead, get the horses ready. We'll go after the traitors.
All those in favor of Abdurrahman Alp's execution?

text: Kayı beylerinin uygun gördüğü bir günde…
english: On a day when the Kayı lords see fit...
Mr. Ertugrul, I wasn't expecting you.
How could you betray me, Hamza?
Take down this stud who attacked your gentleman.

text: İndirin dedim size şu adamı İndirin!
english: I said put that man down!
I'm the new master of Oban Ertugrul
Other than that, you're going to swear to me.

text: Bugüne kadar üzerimizde çok hakkın vardır
english: You've got a lot of rights on us.

text: Lakin bir daha sakın karşıma çıkma Ertuğrul
english: But don't ever come near me again, Ertugrul.
It's not my place to kill a family.
If I don't have all your heads on my spear...

text: …bana da Süleyman Şah oğlu Ertuğrul demesinler
english: ...and don't call me Ertugrul, son of Solomon Shah.

text: İnşallah kurda kuşa yem olmazsın Ertuğrul
english: I hope you don't get eaten by a wolf, Ertugrul.
Say hello to your brother, Gündü.

text: Allah’ım bana pusat tutan elimi geri ver
english: God, give me back my hand.
It's in your best interest to insult me to the enemy.
Look at what we've been through because of Ertugrul.

text: Abdurrahman ve Hamza’yı idam edecektik Bu iş bitecekti
english: We were going to execute Abdurrahman and Hamza. It was going to be over.

text: Obamızın huzuru için ne gerekiyorsa yapacağız
english: We'll do whatever it takes to keep our Oba safe.
Why don't you just calm down?
Pack up. We're going back to Obaya.

text: Her Musa’ya bir Hızır gönderene bakmak lazım
english: Each Moses must look at the one who sends a Hizir
The cranes report from the Noyan Mutt

text: İlk önce biz ona musallat olacağız
Abdurrahman’ı kurtarmam lazım Hadi uğurlar ola

english: We wanted to be united and united...
We ate the dagger of betrayal from our backs.
We shared our delights, shared our kitchens...
...the peace of mind has left our office.

text: Bu obaya huzur yeniden gelmeli Korkut Bey
english: The peace must return to this room, Mr. Scare.

text: Yoksa Kayı yüzünden Dodurga da elinden gidecek
english: Or he'll lose Dodurga because of his brother.
Gentlemen, when you accept the union...
You all knew there could be fragments.

text: Bütün bu olabileceklere rağmen birleşelim dedik. Artık oyunbozanlık edilmez
english: We thought we'd get together despite all that might happen, and we're not gonna be a spoilsport anymore.

text: Kayı’nın yaralıları, dertlileri sayesinde kesen doldu tabii
english: Of course, the wounded of the apricot were filled with those who were troubled.
Let's get down to brass tacks.

text: Kayılar ihanetlerinin bedelini ödesinler Yoksa kan gövdeyi götürür
english: The apricots must pay for their betrayal or the blood will take away the body.
We want a diet We want a price

text: Korkut Bey’in otağında beyler bizden bedel isteyecektir
english: In the tent of Korak Bey, the men will ask us for a price.

text: Ödemediğimiz bedel kalmadı zaten Bunu da öderiz
english: There's a price to pay We'll pay for it

text: …üzerimize yapışan bu hainlik yaftasından nasıl kurtulacağız?
english: How are we supposed to get rid of this ratty label that's stuck on us?
We fought with so many enemies.
None of them hurt me as much as Hamza.

text: Ya başından beri hain o ise?
english: What if he's the traitor from the start?
What if he led us to the slaughter?

text: Hamza, Gündoğdu’ya öfkesinden bu hâle gelmiştir
english: Hamza became like this because of the rage of the sun.
What are we gonna do, Mom?

text: Kayı ahalisi yeniden göçe ne der?
english: What would the people of the Apricot say about migration again?

text: Kayı için göç Azrail’e koşmaktır Hayme Ana
english: Migration for Kayı is to run to the Grim Reaper Hayme Ana

text: Göç için ne takatimiz ne de malımız vardır
english: We have neither the means nor the means to emigrate.

text: Er geç o bedel de ödenecektir
english: Sooner or later, that price will be paid.

text: Sen buna bedel mi dersin abi?
english: Do you think it's worth it?

text: Biz size obamızı, soframızı açmakla fazlasıyla bedel ödedik zaten
english: We've already paid you enough to open our table.
Ah, here's the thing, the Apricots' Alps...

text: Obadaki her Kayı ileride Noyan’ın malı olabilir
english: Every Apricot in the Oba could be the property of Noyan.
How can we live with so many traitors?
The men of Dodurga surrendered to their anger.
They mix the straw with the handle

text: Ben de derim ki; Kayılar toydaki vazifelerinden el çeksin
english: And I say, let the apricots withdraw from their duties in the green.

text: Ya da Alpleri pusatlarını teslim etsin
english: Or the Alps will hand over their pusats.

text: Bu, Kayıları emir erimiz yapmak demektir
english: That means making the Apricots our order.

text: Onlar bizim emir erimiz bile olamaz
english: They can't even be our orders.
Oh, that's enough to lead our packs.
Mr. Scare, are you all right?
Help me. Are you all right, sir?

text: Velhasıl Tuğtekin bize olan güvenini yitirmiştir ana
english: So the Tugtekin has lost confidence in us, Mother.

text: Bundan gayrı Tuğtekin’in yüzüne nasıl bakarız?
english: How can we look at other Tugtekin's face?

text: Bir hain çıktı diye öyle bütün oba töhmet altında bırakılmaz
english: You can't just leave the whole thing on account of a traitor.

text: Kim bilir onların içinde de ne hainler barınır
english: Who knows what traitors they'll find in them?
If only there was one traitor

text: Geldiğimiz günden beri obada huzur mu bıraktık?
english: Have we been at peace in the room since the day we arrived?
With all these nets on our heads...
I'd be surprised at how our dress is tied up.
I said don't get in the way of the migration You didn't listen
If we feed our animals in a dangerous land like this...
At his age, when he should have taken a breath of peace...
I guess it's a dead end, huh?

text: Obada nizah çıkmasın bey Töreyi bozmayalım
english: I don't want Obada to break the law, sir. Let's not break the rules.
Is that the way it is, Artuk?

text: Tuğtekin, bu yapacağın düşman saflarını sıklaştırır
english: Tugtekin, that makes the enemy's ranks more frequent.

text: Önce onları lokmalara ayır Sonra afiyetle yersin
english: You'll eat them first, and then you'll enjoy them.
Does the gentleman sip this syrup?

text: Bu yaşta bunlar onu mezara götürür
english: At his age, they take him to the grave.

text: Beni Süleyman Şah oğullarıyla yalnız bırakın
english: Leave me alone with the sons of Solomon Shah.
Look me in the eye, both of you.

text: Ben sizi bu günler için yetiştirmedim
english: I didn't raise you for these days.
If your father, Solomon, was still alive...
What would he say to you people, huh?
We've been through a lot of trouble.
We got rid of all that sherry.
How will you face the people?

text: Bu vakitten sonra bir daha birbirinize el kaldırırsanız…
english: If you ever raise your hand to each other again after this time...
I won't give you my blessing.
Give me a hug and give me your blessing.

text: Helal olsun Sen de helal et kardeşim

english: Power is the lust that comes out of a man's veins.
Gold is the cheap concubine of lust

text: Hiçbirinizin şu adi altınlara tamah etmeyeceğini bilirim
english: I know that none of you are going to put up with that cheap gold.

text: Siz cihanın en güçlü ordusuyla cenk etmek…
english: You fight with the most powerful army of the jihad...

text: …cihanın en büyük ordusunun bir neferi olmak için buradasınız
english: ...you're here to become a guardian of the greatest army of the jihad.

text: Ha, içinizde altına tamah etmek isteyen varsa…
english: Oh, if any of you want to poop your pants...
...let him have as much gold as he wants from me.

text: İsterse ona sahip olduğum tüm altınları vereyim
english: I'll give him all the gold I've got if he wants.

text: Siz altın için yola çıkmış ucuz yiğitler değilsiniz
english: You're not cheap heroes on the road for gold.

text: Siz cihanın gördüğü en iyi savaşçılarsınız
english: You are the best warriors the jihad has ever seen.

text: Şimdi de, binlerce yıldır kardeşiniz olan Moğolların…
english: And now, the Mongols, who have been your brothers for thousands of years...

text: …Cihan Sultanı Ögeday’ın hizmetine girmek için buradasınız
english: ...you are here to attend the service of the Sultan of Jahan.
With the best warriors of the jihad...

text: Bundan böyle benim bir neferim değil…
english: From now on, it's no longer my neferi...
No one's asking you to move.
Follow the word of my Lord Tuğtekin
Sleep on it so it doesn't matter.
We obey the word of the gentleman.

text: Yemek getirdik İki lokma bir şey yesin
english: We brought food. Let him have a bite to eat.
But get out of here soon.

text: Sana iki lokma bir şey getirdik kardeş
english: We brought you something to eat, brother.
They say Hamza was a traitor.

text: Belki başından beri hain oydu Obayı da kıyıma o sürükledi
english: Maybe he was the traitor from the beginning, and he led Oba to the slaughter.
They're going to want to take the anger out on me.

text: …biz oldukça senin kılına zarar gelmez kardeş
english: As long as we don't hurt you, brother.
Brother, you must take care of your health.

text: Sana bir şey olursa bütün ahali perişan olur
english: If anything happens to you, the whole community will be devastated.
The people of Hayme are already miserable.

text: Tüm beylerim Kayı’ya sahip çıkmanın karşılığı bu mudur der
english: All my gentlemen say, "Is this what you get for taking care of Kayi?"

text: Ya diğer Kayılar da hain çıkarsa der
english: What if the other apricots turn out to be traitors?
They say we've lost our peace of mind.

text: Peki sen bütün bunlara ne dersin?
english: What do you think of all this?

text: Benim güzel bacım Beylerimi sakinleştirmem gerek
english: My beautiful sister, I need to calm my gentlemen down.
You have to pay for it.
...or let your Alps drop their pusats.

text: Abi, senin beylerin biz çoban olalım…
english: Brother, your gentlemen, let's be shepherds...
...and he'd say, "Let the record be our version."

text: Kayı bize kulluk etsin der Öyle mi?
english: Ayi says he must worship us, huh?

text: Benim beylerim bugüne kadar aslanlar gibi durdu
english: My men have looked like lions to this day.

text: Sen kabahati kendi oğlun Ertuğrul ve boyunda ara
english: You blame your own son Ertugrul and his height.
Or this union will fall apart.
No one knows what's on your mind.

text: Gönlümden geçeni dilim duysa, dilimizi keserim ki…
english: If I could speak my heart, I'd cut out our tongue...

text: Başımız dertten, beladan zaten kurtulmaz Ertuğrul
english: We won't get out of trouble anyway, Ertuğrul.

text: De hele Gönlünden geçeni bilmek isterim
english: I'd like to know what's in your heart.
In my heart, crazy colts roll

text: Bu deli taylar, sanki gün gelecek…
english: These crazy colts, it's like the day will come...
...that the tamga of our necks will spread all over the world.
The world will kneel before us...
Justice will fly through the skies...

text: Daha bir obamız bile yok Ertuğrul
english: We don't even have an oba yet, Ertugrul.
How can we have all the jihan?
I won't tell anyone what I've been through.

text: Bak, sen bile deli tayların bana dediğine inanmazsın
english: Look, even you don't believe what crazy colts tell me.

text: Bütün bu belaları, bu şerleri nasıl def edeceğiz Tuğtekin?
english: How are we going to get rid of all this trouble and all this evil, Tugtekin?
He who sows the wind reaps the storm, the Sky

text: Biz Türkler bu diyarları vatan eylemek için geldik
english: We Turks have come to carry out these lands for our country.

text: O yüzden bu topraklar bize yâr olana dek bu bedelleri ödeyeceğiz
english: That's why we're going to pay the price until this land is ours.
First, we have to clean up the room and clean up the traitors.
It's gonna be good. It's gonna be good.

text: Sen bunları boş ver Hadi gel yarış eyleyelim
english: Don't worry about it. Let's race.
While your Alps compete in the act of treason...

text: Sen de bey olup, hainlerin peşinden koşacağına…
english: And instead of being a gentleman and going after traitors...
You ride in the country, huh?

text: Ona bir şey yapacaksın diye çok korktum Ertuğrul
english: I was so afraid you'd do something to her, Ertugrul.
You've got some good hands, huh?

text: Koca kafanın her hinliğe çalıştığını bilirdik de
english: We knew that your big head worked in every cyclone.
What did you see in me, Bully brother?
The javelin is in its nest.
I don't know where he's standing.
They came to see Abdurrahman today.

text: Bir daha benim sözümü dinlemezsen senin etlerini kurda kuşa yem ederim
english: If you don't listen to me again, I'll feed your meat to the wolf.
I said you won't let me see him!
If he makes the slightest mistake, you'll be on top of him.
Mr. Scare me, from my mother
To pull us out of the foyer.

text: ya da Alplerin pusat bırakmasını istemiş
english: Or he wanted the Alps to give up the stroller.
Look at the state we're in.

text: Yer yarılaydı da bu hale gelmeyeydik
english: It was halfway to the ground, so we wouldn't be like this.
We'll break the game with the game.
We're going to draw Tugtekin down on us.

text: O zaten hep ensemizde hata yapmamızı bekler
english: He always expects us to make a mistake on the back of our necks.

text: O vakit biz de ona hata yaptıracağız
english: Then we'll make him make a mistake.
What are we going to do, sir?

text: Tuğtekin’in töre bilmez bir Alp olduğunu

english: We'll show it to all the people.

text: Hainliğiniz yetmedi şimdi de bize kafa mı tutarsınız siz?
english: Your treachery wasn't enough, now you're going to stand up to us?
My brother expects answers from us.

text: Dayımla son bir kez konuşmak isterim ana
english: I'd like to speak to my uncle one last time, ma'am.

Our flag, our flag, don't, don't, don't, don't, don't, don't, don't, don't, don't, don't, don't, don't, don't, don't, don't, don't, don't, don't, don't, don't, don't, don't, don't, don't, don't, don't, don't, don't, don't, don't, don't, don't, don't, don't, don't, don't, don't, don't, don't, don't, don't!

text: Senin gücün, Kayı Beyi'nin emanetine mi yeter Tuğtekin?
english: Is your power enough for Mr. Kayi's trust, Tugtekin?

text: Unutma ki bu basit bir bez parçası değildir
english: Remember, it's not just a piece of cloth.
To remove his anger from his heritage
It doesn't suit an Alpine like you.

text: Senin hâlâ konuşmaya yüzün var demek!
english: You still have the face to talk!

text: Noyan’ın köpeği olan senin Alplerin! Ne çabuk unuttun!
english: Your Alps, the dog of Noyan!

text: Senin bir emrinle ölüme gidecek yiğitlere
english: To the brave who will die by your command
Instead of being a brother to the Alps, a father to the Alps
You're the one who betrayed them.
The price of your own incompetence

text: başkalarına ödeterek mi bu obada birliği sağlayacaksın Tuğtekin?
english: You're going to make this club a union by making others pay, Tugtekin?
What do you want to do?
What do we live for, huh?

text: Bir nefesine bile hükmedemediğimiz bu cihanda
english: In this world where we can't even hold a breath

text: sonu gelmek bilmeyen savaşlara girmemizin nedeni nedir?
english: What is the reason for us to engage in endless wars?

text: Atalarımızın miraslarını ayaklarımızın altına alıp ezmek mi
english: To crush the heritage of our ancestors under our feet?
Don't leave the inheritance unattended, brother.

text: Tuğtekin’e güvenip de Alplerin komutasını verdik
english: We trusted Tuğtekin. We gave command of the Alps.
Tugtekin is out of line this time.

text: Ertuğrul, Tuğtekin’e layık olduğu gibi davranmıştır
english: Ertuğrul acted as he was worthy of Tuğtekin.
Your brick is out of line.

text: Lakin, Tuğtekin’i sırtından vuran da bizim Alplerimiz
english: But our Alps are the ones who shot Tugtekin in the back
It might not have come to this.

text: Eğer obadaki bu ikiliğe bir dur demezsek
english: If we don't put a stop to this double in the room,

text: Moğollardan evvel biz birbirimizin işini bitireceğiz
english: We'll finish each other off before the Mongols do.

text: Daha ne kadar beni ezip geçmesine tahammül edeceksin
english: How long are you gonna let him walk all over me?

text: Uhuletle ve suhuletle bu meseleyi halletmek lazımdır Tuğtekin
english: We need to settle this with Uhulet and silence.

text: Halam bir yandan, o bir yandan
english: My aunt, on the one hand, on the other.
You always thought he was better than me!

text: Alpleri ihanet etti Noyan'ın peşinden gitti
english: The Alps betrayed him. He went after Noyan.

text: Bütün bunlar niye oldu biliyor musun baba?
english: You know what all this is about, Dad?

text: Bütün bunlar niye oldu biliyor musun baba?
english: You know what all this is about, Dad?
Because you've always looked out for him!
Do you favor Ertugrul because you love him?
Or is it because you're afraid of him?
Are you afraid of him, Dad?
Are you afraid of him, Dad?
You can't just send the flag of the oban
He's too weak to see them.
The reputation of Tuğtekin is Dodurga's.
You must save the reputation of Tugtekin
You've got to kick his ass to the rebel Kai Alps.

text: Bu zor günlerimizde attığım her adım çığ gibi bana geri dönüyor Aytolun
english: Every step I take in these hard times comes back to me like an avalanche, Aytolun.
It is necessary to rub Ertugrul's nose

text: Aksi halde, sana itaat etmek yerine

english: Every step of the way will be a liability.
How do I do that, Aytolun?

text: Bir yanda canım kadar sevdiğim kardeşim Hayme
english: On the one hand, my beloved brother Hayme

text: Öteki tarafta Oğuzların göz bebeği Ertuğrul
english: On the other side is the oğuz's pupil Ertuğrul

text: Bir taşla iki kuş vurmuş olursun
english: You'd be killing two birds with one stone.
And the Dodurga people will be happy.
What do you want from Abdurrahman?
Get out of the way, get out of the way!

text: Çek elini! Asıl sen çek elini üstümden

english: Tell me, who sent you here?
What would you like from Abdurrahman?
Get out of the way, it's Mr. Scare's orders.
What kind of dirty grin do you have, traitor?
What's the matter with you that I'm doomed?
Only my Lord, the Most High, gives.
Tied to the abandonment of a wild mare
Let's see if you talk like that.
Sir, it's exactly what you wanted.
He's got his hand wrapped tight
I don't have a broken hand anymore.

text: Beyim, ters giden bir şey olursa bana haber ver demiştiniz
english: Sir, you told me to let you know if anything went wrong.
They've come to take Abdurrahman, sir.

text: Hayır da şer de beyimin ağzından çıkar
english: No, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no,
I'll slap you in the face.
You've got a big mouth. You've got a big mouth.
What is good and what is bad is from Allah?
The one who drew the sword on his brother today

text: yarın keferenin çizmesini öper, bilmez misiniz?
english: Don't you know he'll kiss the kefere's boot tomorrow?
He's going to be executed in the training hall.

text: Geldiğinden beri her gün, her gece
english: Every day, every night since you came

text: Alpleriyle bir işler karıştırır durur beyim
english: He'll mix things up with his Alps, sir.

text: Obanın dışında da gizli gizli biriyle buluşuyor
english: He's meeting someone secretly outside the Obana.
I'll soon find out who you are, sir.
If they let him go, he'll put his ball at the stake.

text: Beni çamura gömüp, üstümde tepindikten sonra
english: After you buried me in the mud and stomped on me
So he's come to his senses.

text: Babanla büyük bir beylik olma yolunda bütün engelleri aştınız
english: You and your father have overcome all obstacles to becoming a great master.

text: Sultan Alaeddin'den beklediğimiz hayırlı haber de gelecek
english: We expect good news from Sultan Alaeddin.
We will grow and grow strong in our own land.

text: Sana düşen sadece sabırlı olmak Tuğtekin
english: It's only up to you to be patient, Tugtekin.

text: Ertuğrul buradayken bu nasıl olacak ana?
english: How will this happen when Ertugrul is here, Mother?
Like the hand of Ertugrul soon
His reputation will be ruined, Tugtekin.
It's like your father used to say.

text: Ertuğrul’un Alplerinin ihanetin bedelini nasıl ödettiğinizi göster
english: Show me how you made the Alps of Ertugrul pay for treason

text: Bir çolağın, kaderini değiştirmesine izin vermeyeceğini göster
english: Show that you won't let a child change your destiny.

text: Ağabey, nasıl böyle bir şey yaparsın?
english: Brother, how could you do such a thing?

text: Benden habersiz nasıl infaz kararı verirsin?
english: How can you order an execution without me knowing?

text: Ben sadece iki obanın toyda aldıkları kararı yerine getirdim Hayme
english: I've only fulfilled the decision made by two obans in the naive, Hayme.
Now is the time for the execution.
Otherwise things will get out of hand.
You can't take the life of my Alps.

text: Onun infaz edileceği vakte ben karar vereceğim
Alplerin bize ihanet etmeden önceydi o
english: That was before the Alps betrayed us.

text: Oğlum ya da ben bir darbe daha yersek
english: If my son or I take another hit
Everyone can take care of themselves.

text: İşinin de, ortaklığının da canı cehenneme!
english: To hell with your job and your partnership!
If I can't protect that trust
How do I protect your power of attorney?

text: belki artık o vekaleti de taşıyamıyorum
english: Maybe I don't have that power of attorney anymore.

text: Senin varlığındır bizi bir arada tutan
english: It's your presence that keeps us together.
We're more torn apart than we've ever been.

text: Abdurrahman'ın masum olduğunu sen de bilirsin değil mi?
english: You know Abdurrahman is innocent, don't you?

text: Hamza’nın da bize ihanet etmeyeceğini düşünürdük ana
english: We thought Hamza would not betray us, too, Mother.
I don't know who to trust.

text: Bana hesap sormaya mı geldin Ertuğrul?
english: Have you come to answer to me, Ertugrul?

text: Bir zamanlar tanıdığım, yiğit dayım nerededir diye merak ettim
english: I wondered where my brave uncle, whom I once knew, was.

text: Bana gücün yetmediği için mi Alp'imi infaz etmek istersin dayı?
english: Do you want to execute my Alps because you can't afford me, Uncle?

text: benim yiğit Alp'imin kanlı kefeniyle mi örteceksin?
english: Will you cover it with the bloody shroud of my brave Alps?
My brave uncle, whom I know and love

text: böyle bir işe kalkışmayacak kadar şereflidir
english: He's too honorable to do such a thing.

text: Kulak kabartıp itimat ettiğin insanlara dikkat et
english: Pay attention to the people you listen to and trust.

text: İçindeki öfkeyle hepimizi nasıl bir uçuruma sürüklediğini fark et artık!
english: Now you realize how much anger you've driven us all to a cliff!

text: İki obaya da yaptıklarına bir bak
english: Look what you've done to both the oboes.

text: elini yiğit bir Alpin kanına bulama
english: Don't get your hands on a brave Alpin's blood.

text: Yoksa Alplerimin gözünde hiçbir itibarın kalmaz
english: Or you'll have no reputation in the eyes of my Alps.
The decision will be carried out.

text: Bana başka çıkar yol bırakmadın Ertuğrul
english: You left me no other way out, Ertugrul.
Maybe you know your way around.
When have you ever been so thoughtless?
Or are you in other accounts?

text: gün gelir, o hesapları ortaya çıkarırım dayı
english: Someday, I'll find out those accounts, Uncle.

text: Bana ikimizin de pişman olacağı şeyler yaptırma!
english: Don't make me do things we'll both regret!

text: Ertuğrul Bey'im buna izin vermez de bana

english: We can't let Abdurrahman be executed.
Our Alps are ready to drop their pusats.
But we have only one desire

text: Abdurrahman'ın infaz kararını Hayme Ana'm versin
english: Mother Hayme will decide Abdurrahman's execution
If that's the way it is.

text: Yapma bunu. Ver şu idam emrini

english: Untie the prisoner, take him to his cage.
Did they bring word from the apricots?
Everything's just the way we want it.

text: Demek ortalık fena karışmış ha Tangut?
english: So it's a mess, huh, Tangut?
Sooner or later Abdurrahman will be executed.

text: Bu Kayı Alplerini daha da bileyecek
english: This Kai will know even more about the Alps.

text: Öfkeden ne yaptığını bilemez hale gelecek
english: He'll get angry and he won't know what he's doing.

text: Ondan sonra iki obayı birbirine bağlayan bütün dikişler patlar
english: Then all the stitches that connect the two obas will explode.
You're going to poke the Turks
Mind your own business instead of picking on each other.
What do you think of what happened, Gökçe?

text: Bu ihanetin bedeli er ya da geç ödenecektir Aytolun Hatun
english: The price of this betrayal will be paid sooner or later, Aytolun Hatun

text: Yoksa bedeli çok daha ağır olur
english: Or else the price will be much greater.

text: O halde bunu o tatlı dilinle Tuğtekin'e anlat
english: Then tell that to Tugtekin with your sweet tongue.

text: Ağabeyin Ertuğrul’a hâlâ öfkesi çok büyük
english: Your brother is still very angry with Ertugrul.
Your anger was a righteous rage
You put yourself wrongly when you were right.
And you have dishonored the Apricots.
I know, I made a mistake.

text: hayatım boyunca yaşamadığım utancı yaşattı bana
english: He made me feel the shame I've never had in my whole life.
He breaks their hearts in a heartbeat.
It hits them in the face like a rag

text: Sen neden bu kadar kızgınsın ağabeyine?
english: Why are you so mad at your brother?
You can ride as fast as you want.

text: Kocan olmasaydı hepiniz ırmağa karışan çamur gibi dağılırdınız
english: If it weren't for your husband, you'd all be scattered like mud in the river.

text: Dua edin ki Gündoğdu gibi bir beyiniz var
english: You're lucky you've got a brain like the sunrise.

text: Onun gibi yiğit, onun gibi onurlu bir erkeğin
english: A brave man like him, an honorable man like him

text: senin gibi bir kadına bir gün bile katlanması mucize
english: It's a miracle he put up with a woman like you for one day.

text: Cihan'ın gördüğü en iyi savaşçılar orada
english: There are the best warriors Jahan has ever seen.
I want them all in my army, Hamza.

text: Vakti gelince hepsi senin için savaşacaklar
english: When the time comes, they'll all fight for you.
I have some good news for you.

text: birlik bozulmasın diye obayı terk edecekmiş
english: He's going to leave the oba to keep the union from falling apart.
Ertugrul would never leave his office.

text: Sürüsünden ayrılan yaralı kurdun sonu ne olur dersiniz?
english: What do you think would be the end of the wounded wolf leaving his flock?

text: Gıkını çıkartırsan senin kelleni kopartırım. Ayağa kalk
english: If you make a sound, I'll cut your head off.

text: Bu kadar ucuz kurtulacağını mı sandın?
english: Did you think you'd get off that easy?

text: Eğer uyursan, kımıldarsan ya da kaçmaya kalkarsan
english: If you fall asleep, move or try to escape

text: Yarın sabah Doğan'la Geyikli'nin mağarasına gideceksiniz
english: Tomorrow morning you'll go to the den of Dogan and Deer.
You'll be waiting to hear from me there.

text: Malum sen de obadan gidiyorsun Onu böyle bırakıp
english: You know, you're going to leave the room and leave her like this.
I'll send him to Deer's cave with you.

text: Bize güvenmez misin? Kaç vakittir çok şeyi bize söylemez oldun

english: You know everything I have against the enemy.

text: Bilirim ki düşman ne dilinizi ne de yüreğinizi çözebilir
english: I know the enemy can't break your tongue or your heart
The people we're dealing with aren't our enemies.

text: Bundan gayrı ne kadar az şey bilirseniz o kadar iyidir
english: The less you know about it, the better.
I want you to leave early in the morning.

text: Benden bir isteğin var mı beyim?
english: Is there anything I can do for you, sir?

text: Sen her oğul anasının isteyeceği bir gelinsin
english: You're the kind of daughter-in-law any son of a bitch would want.

text: Hayırlısıyla o günleri de görürüz inşallah
english: We'll see those days for the best.
The sky is about to finish the armor you asked for.
But he says there are some things to take

text: Birlikte Erzurum'a gittiğinizde alırsınız artık derim
english: When you go to Erzurum together, you'll get it.

text: Ben artık yatayım Sizin konuşacaklarınız vardır
english: I'm gonna go to bed. You guys have something to talk about.
Sit down, let's have a chat.
You came to me today and talked to me.
You kept my anger from blowing me away

text: Bundan böyle dilimden de gönlümden de anlayan biri var artık
english: From now on, there's someone who understands my tongue and my heart.

text: İki genç birbirlerini görmeden duramazlar bey
english: Two young men can't stop seeing each other, sir.

text: Artık beni rahmetli anası gibi sever, sayar
english: Now she loves me as if I were her late mother.
He's got a crush on her.

text: Döndüklerinde kalbinden geçeni hep beraber öğreniriz
english: When they return, we'll all know what's in your heart.

text: Peki Hayme ne diyecek bu işe?

english: With the daughter of Solomon Shah

text: Korkut Bey'in oğlu aynı yastığa baş koyarsa
english: If Mr. Kork's son lays his head on the same pillow

text: bundan bir değil, iki gerdek çıkar beyim
english: It's not one, it's two weddings, sir.

text: Dodurgalılarla Kayı'nın nikahı da kıyılmış olur
english: The wedding of the Dodugas and Kaiyı will also be performed.
It's because of our kids who don't live, isn't it?
If you run away from me like this
If you turn your back on me

text: bu işin sonu nereye varır Gündoğdu'm?
english: Where does this end, my sunshine?

text: Doğmadan ölen bebelerimin acısı hâlâ kor gibi içimde Selcan
english: The pain of my babies who died before they were born is still burning inside of me, Selcan.

text: Bir de doğup da emziremediklerin var
english: And what you were born with, you didn't suckle.

text: Ben bir küçük bedeni daha toprağa vermeye dayanamam
english: I can't bear to bury another little body.
May God forgive me my sins.

text: Gayrı böyle bir acıyı yüreğim kaldırmaz benim
bu çadırda çocuk sesi duymayacağız dersin, öyle mi?
english: You don't think we're gonna hear a kid's voice in this tent, do you?

text: Ya da beni bu çadıra diri diri gömmek istersin
english: Or you want to bury me alive in this tent.

text: Tuğtekin Bey'imin kesin emri var Kimseyle görüşmeyecek
english: There's a direct order from Mr. Tuğtekin that he won't see anyone.

text: İçeri hiç kimse girmeyecek Dışarı çıkan olursa da
english: No one goes in, no one goes out.
Let's go. Get out of here.

text: Hadi şimdi git Gece gece iş çıkartma başımıza
english: Go on now. Don't make trouble at night.

text: Ömrünü verdiğin beylerin sana nasıl ihanet ettiler gördün
english: You see how the men you gave your life to betrayed you.

text: Hayme Ana'n bile seni silip attı
english: Even your Hayme Ana wiped you out.
He won't stop by and ask how you're doing.
You're still the dog of your gentlemen.

text: kimlerle birlikte iş tuttuğunu ifşa edersen
english: If you reveal who you're in business with

text: Sürgüne gidip güzel bir hayat yaşayabilirsin
english: You can go into exile and live a good life.

text: Benimle birlikte kimlerin başını yakmak istersin Kocabaş?
english: Who do you want to burn with me, Sasquatch?

text: Evlat, senin ne işin var burada?
english: Son, what are you doing here?
I bring you the greetings of Mr. Ertugrul.

text: Dikkatli olun. Çadırın etrafında kuş dahi uçmayacak
english: Be careful, not even a bird will fly around the tent.
I want you to take care of Doğan and Turgut.

text: aman diyeyim, onun başına bir ahval gelmesin
english: I'll tell you what, don't let anything happen to him.

There's a fire, there's a fire, there's a fire, there's a fire, there's a fire, there's a fire, there's a fire, there's a fire, there's a fire, there's a fire, there's a fire, there's a fire, there's a fire, there's a fire, there's a fire, there's a fire, there's a fire, there's a fire, there's a fire, there's a fire!

text: Çadır yanıyor! Bu tarafa gelin! Yangın var!
Çabuk koş, Tuğtekin Bey'imize haber ver
english: Hurry up and tell Mr. Tuğtekin

There's a fire, there's a fire, there's a fire, there's a fire, there's a fire, there's a fire, there's a fire, there's a fire, there's a fire, there's a fire, there's a fire, there's a fire, there's a fire, there's a fire, there's a fire, there's a fire, there's a fire, there's a fire, there's a fire, there's a fire!

text: Yüzün gölgelenince dilim damağım dolaşır gibi oluyor
english: When your face gets shaded, my tongue feels like it's going around in my mouth.
I don't know what to say.
Sir, the tent is on fire.
What's more, it's none of your business

text: ne de Alplerinin başına geleceklere yapabileceğimiz bir şey yoktur
english: There's nothing we can do about what happens to the Alps.

text: Abdurrahman'ın yaşaması için elimden geleni yapacağım Ertuğrul
english: I'll do my best to keep Abdurrahman alive Ertugrul

text: Lakin Abdurrahman'ın canı bize emanet değildir
english: But Abdurrahman's life is not in our hands

text: Sen de bunu çok iyi bilirsin
english: And you know that very well.
What do you mean, it's not?
God damn it, God damn it!
When I held my grandson in my arms
The world will be mine now.
I hope the parents can grow up, too.
Don't you dare say that, girl.

text: Seni alçak! Sen kaçırdın değil mi?
english: You bastard, you kidnapped him, didn't you?

text: Bu ne densizlik Tuğtekin! Kim kimi kaçırdı? Ne dersin sen?
english: Who kidnapped who, what do you think?

text: Kafesli çadır yandı Abdurrahman içinde yok
english: The caged tent burned down. Abdurrahman's not in it.

text: Ne yangından ne de Abdurrahman'dan haberim vardır ana
english: I don't know about the fire or Abdurrahman, Ana.

text: Tuğtekin ve Alpleri emanete sahip çıkamamışlar
english: Tugtekin and the Alps couldn't take care of the trust.

text: Eğer ona bir şey yaptıysanız canınızı alırım
english: If you did anything to him, I'll take your life.

text: Bir daha benim otağıma böyle girersen ecelin benim elimden olur!
english: If you ever go in my tent like that again, your death will be at my hands!

text: Bu işi yapıp yapmadığından emin değilim
english: I'm not sure if he did it or not.

text: O yüzden bir süre obadan uzak durasın
english: So stay away from the oba for a while.
You'll be on your way by dawn.
Pick up your coyotes, get out of here!
Don't worry, no matter where I am
I'll be with you and our baby.
You ask me to be patient, I know

text: Yüreğime taş basıp seni beklememi istersin
english: You want me to wait for you with a rock in my heart
That's what I'm gonna do, Ertugrul.
My baby's gonna be our mattress.
These are the Alps of Ertugrul, born with Turgut.
You met him at the caravansaray.

text: canlarımızı meydana şehit olalım diye çıkarırız
english: We take our lives out into the open to be martyrs.
Shall I go after them, Noyan?

text: Tangut, peşlerinden beş tane adam yolla
english: Tangut, send five men after them.

text: Kimsin sen meczup? Ne işin var burada?

english: Have you seen two Alps around here?
You're a fool, but you're talented.

text: Marifet bizde değil Bu imansız başlara secde ettiren
english: We don't have the advantage of prostrating to these faithless beginnings.

text: Kabul edin artık Bu işi Ertuğrul ve Alpleri yaptı
english: Face it, Ertugrul and the Alps did it.
Your four Alpins were on duty in the tent.

text: Çadır yanarken ne halt ediyorlardı acaba ha?
english: What the hell were they doing burning the tent?
My mother says it's true, Tugtekin
The Alps are incapable of keeping watch.
What are you doing here, Gökçe?
I couldn't let you go like this.

text: Her tarafımız düşman kaynarken ne yaparsın burada?
english: What do you do here when we're surrounded by enemies?
Then why would you go, Ertuğrul?

text: Madem her yanımızı Moğol sarmış bu yaralı elinle nereye gidersin?
english: If we're surrounded by Mongols, where will you go with this wounded hand?
She raised her sister and Gökçe as her daughters.
You go get the horses ready.
